name: pluz box
description:
Welcome to number game.
plus number faster and exciting.
Challenge yourself NOW.

If you want to test the ability of plusing numbers, For a limited time.
Come here.
We have many questions waiting for you to find.
So..., See. How far you can go?
Many questions !!
A lot of picture when you down!!

How to play ?
You can tap the numbers to plus them.
Every higher level, you can tap the number more than the previous level.
You can cancel a number you have selected. By pressing it again.
you have limited time, so please choose carefully.
You can share your high scores to your friends on Facebook.

Come on.

Download now!!
publishers: Perumal Technology and Telecommunication Co., Thailand
